channel.title: Where can I change how hard my range hits?
channel.description: It hits so low people don't even use it except for the dark bow......

item.title: Where can I change how hard my range hits?
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape

[quote=" Wowzers!, post:6, topic:194712"][quote author=The Prodigyscape link=topic=259030.msg2148862#msg2148862 date=1206945288]
Rofl those are bonuses…
Not what I wan’t to change…
[/quote]
yes this makes sense scarr[/quote]

Dude…There are other ways than just changing bonuses.
I know that is not the way to do it because every single ranging object hits low and their bonuses are just fine…

item.title: Where can I change how hard my range hits?
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

Hmm…Well, if you want to change how much “bonus” it gives, go into Item.cfg, search “magic_shortbow” until about…The 5th one down, that’s the one your looking for and it’s the 7th 0. So it’s like 0(tab)0(tab)0(tab)0(tab)0(tab)0(tab)0 <----- That 0.

Read full topic
item.source: Where can I change how hard my range hits?
